cboCostEstimates.description: As ordered reported by the House Committee on Homeland Security on September 14, 2022
cboCostEstimates.title: H.R. 3756, Department of Homeland Security Climate Change Research Act

constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 99 (Tuesday, June 8, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Ms. CLARKE of New York:
H.R. 3756.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article 1, Section 8.
[Page H2701]

latestAction.text: Ordered to be Reported (Amended) by the Yeas and Nays: 19 - 14.

title: Department of Homeland Security Climate Change Research Act
